sentences.en: During that year of agony and the following year of my grieving, everything stopped for me.
sentences.cn: 在那一年的痛苦和接下来整整一年的悲恸中，我生活中的一切都停止了。

sentences.en: He fell awkwardly and went down in agony clutching his right knee.
sentences.cn: 他笨拙地摔倒了，痛苦地抱住右膝倒在地上。

sentences.en: He lay in agony until the doctor arrived.
sentences.cn: 在医生来到之前,他一直非常痛苦地躺在那里.

sentences.en: He staggered around the playground, screaming in agony.
sentences.cn: 他绕着运动场跌跌撞撞地走着，并且痛苦地大叫。

sentences.en: He was in an agony of remorse.
He was squirming on the floor in agony.
sentences.cn: 他躺在地上痛苦地扭动着.

sentences.en: He was writhing on the ground in agony.
His face screwed up in agony.

sentences.cn: 他临死的挣扎已经过去了.

sentences.en: I was in an agony of doubt.
Jack collapsed in agony on the floor.
sentences.cn: 杰克十分痛苦地瘫倒在地板上。

sentences.en: She asked the nurse how long her agony must last.
sentences.cn: 她问护士,她的极端痛苦要延续多久.

sentences.en: She was writhing around on the floor in agony.
sentences.cn: 她痛得在地板上直打滚。

sentences.en: The Aussie was in agony with a broken finger.
sentences.cn: 这个澳大利亚人承受着断指之痛。
